title: LibGuides: COVID-19 Resources for Patients and Families: Indigenous Peoples
author: Vesna Silobad
description: LibGuides: COVID-19 Resources for Patients and Families: Indigenous Peoples
cleaned_text: The term "vaccine hesitancy" is used in health care to describe an individual's uncertainty or unwillingness to receive a COVID-19 vaccination. Learn more about COVID-19 vaccine hesitancy and benefits of getting vaccinated. List of virtual health care services offered by the First Nations Health Authority to First Nations people in BC who have limited access to health care services in their communities, who must travel long distances for appointments or whose access to health care has been disrupted by the COVID-19 pandemic.
